How America created the enemy it feared most https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/how-america-created-the-enemy-it-feared-most/WIVQLV76OFB3JLBIXJXNLLWOBQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/how-america-created-the-enemy-it-feared-most/WIVQLV76OFB3JLBIXJXNLLWOBQ/ Azam AhmedNew York Times: Why the US lost hearts and minds in Afghanistan's Waygal Valley Sat, 04 Jan 2025 16:00:00 +0000 Mullah Osman Jawhari, who as a Taliban commander in 2008 carried out one of the deadliest attacks on US forces in Afghanistan, in the hills above his home village of Waygal, in Afghanistan's Nuristan Province on Feb. 20, 2023. Osman has forgiven the Americans, outsiders who never understood Afghanistan. Now that they are gone, so, too, is his enmity toward them. Photon / Bryan Denton, The New York Times
